content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE Actors;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Actors (
	[ActorSK] int,
	[ActorId] nvarchar(256),
	[Name] nvarchar(256),
	[DataSourceId] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Actors',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_southridgedatalake02_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDeltaFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Actors
GO
